page.title: 15FARMING,PEMBROKE.
page.content: The area to the south of{Pembroke}has many farms. Years ago there were more farmers than there are today.Now fewer farmers produce more food than ever before. They have machines to help them.Machines help to prepare the ground for planting.They help to harvest the crops.The most useful farm machines are the tractor and the combine harvester. Cart-horses used to work on farms.Now tractors do their work.They can be used all day long.They are used to pull ploughs,harrows,rollers and drills.Ploughs,harrows and rollers prepare the land for planting while drills sow the seeds.
